mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_CONNECTION_HISTORY (uuid, ip, os, browser, accessed_at, success) VALUES (#{connection_hisoty.uuid}, #{connection_hisoty.ip}, #{connection_hisoty.os}, #{connection_hisoty.browser}, #{connection_hisoty.accessed_at}, #{connection_hisoty.success})
mapper.select: SELECT h.* FROM USER_CONNECTION_HISTORY AS h JOIN USER_2ND_AUTH AS a ON h.uuid = a.uuid WHERE a.kakao_user_key=#{kakao_user_key} ORDER BY h.accessed_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT h.* FROM USER_CONNECTION_HISTORY AS h JOIN USER_2ND_AUTH AS a ON h.uuid = a.uuid WHERE a.id=#{id} ORDER BY h.accessed_at DESC
